data.title: Kinds of Kindness: Here’s When It Will Release Digitally
data.meta_description: Yorgos Lanthimos is a director associated with absurd yet really fascinating films. After his Oscar-winner Poor Things, Lanthimos has come up with Kinds of
data.text:
Yorgos Lanthimos is a director associated with absurd yet really fascinating films. After his Oscar-winner Poor Things, Lanthimos has come up with Kinds of Kindness. The film was one of the most anticipated ones of the year 2024. It has been exciting for people for many reasons.

Ever since it was released in the theatres across the globe, there has been a real inquiry regarding when the film will be out digitally. So let us find out the digital release date of this film which delves into many genres, including anthology and dark comedy.

What Is The Story of Kinds of Kindness?

Kinds of Kindness is an anthology of three stories that are connected to each other in some way. These three stories are named, The Death of R.M.F, R.M.F. Is Flying and R.M.F. Eats a Sandwich.

All three of them are written in a triptych fashion. The first story is about a person struggling to have some form of control over his life.

The second story is of a cop who is questioning the identity of his wife. The final storyline is regarding a woman who is looking for a person possessing a different kind of ability. Kinds of Kindness saw its global premiere at the 2024 Cannes Film Festival.

It was released on June 21st in the USA and on June 28th, 2024 in the UK and Ireland.

Cast And Crew

Lanthimos directed Kinds of Kindness; he wrote it with Efthimis Filippou. He also produced the film alongside Kasia Malipan, Ed Guiney, and Andrew Lowe. Emma Stone, who previously worked with the director on Poor Things, plays three roles: Rita, Liz, and Emily.

Other actors in the film are Jesse Plemons, Willem Dafoe, Margaret Qualley, Hong Chau, Joe Alwyn, Mamoudou Athie and Hunter Schafer, Yorgos Stefanakos and Merah Benoit as well as Krystal Alayne Chambers. All of them play multiple characters in all the three stories in the film.

When Will It Release Digitally?

Kinds of Kindness was a critically acclaimed film during its theatrical run. It also managed to earn $13.2 million. Since then, there has been tremendous anticipation regarding when and where it will drop on a streaming platform.

Variety has reported that the film will be released on Tuesday, August 27th, 2024 on two platforms: Apple TV+ and Amazon Prime Video. Kinds of Kindness will also be available on the Blu-ray format Disc as well as DVD on October 8th.

All these releases are very special and fans should keep an eye on them. It features Takes All Kinds: The Vision of Kinds of Kindness which will provide a glimpse into the making of this film through videos as well as interviews with its crew, cast, and others.

The release will also consist of some deleted scenes that the theatrical version did not have. It might consist of some scenes that would help viewers in making full sense of the film.

During its festival run, many people thought the film was way too weird and that they wouldn’t get it. But it managed to do well critically and also made some money.

Conclusion

Kinds of Kindness is yet another offering from a director who has a body of work consisting of some strange films. His work has echoes of David Lynch and has a strong base of fans who enjoy his films.

If you missed the film during its festival and theatrical release, then your wait is over. It will be out soon on two streaming platforms as well as on DVD and Blu-ray. People will be also delighted with some behind-the-scenes footage as well as deleted scenes.
